• Spain is also preparing legislation to ban all wet wipes from sale

items.title: Trump’s anti-climate agenda could result in 1.3m more deaths globally, analysis finds
bullets: • New research shows the vast majority of deaths will occur outside the US
• Most of the people expected to die from soaring temperatures live in poor, hot countries in Africa and south Asia
• The actual number of people who die from heat will be much higher, but a warming planet will also result in fewer deaths from cold

items.title: Stranded whale euthanized after failed rescue attempt off Oregon coast
bullets: • A humpback whale stranded off the coast of Oregon was euthanized on Monday following a failed rescue attempt from several organizations and agencies
• The young whale was found washed ashore near San Marine state park on Saturday
• Individuals rallied together to try to help the mammal, who appeared to be caught in a fishing net
